events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund immediately because this product does not meet my needs.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your order. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo that clearly shows the item I received instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for your prompt help and for resolving this refund issue quickly.
The refund has been processed successfully, and you should see the amount returned on your payment method soon.
We just wanted to check if you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since your refund has been received, we are now closing this support case. Thank you for your patience.
